author: Special Correspondent
text:
A labourer, who was taking bath in an irrigation channel, was fatally knocked down by a speeding car as it plunged into the channel near Shencottai on Saturday. Police said a speeding car, proceeding from Kerala to Tenkasi, plunged into an irrigation channel near Piranoor Border after knocking down the already damaged parapet wall on Saturday. As the car violently hit one Raja from Piranoor Border even as he was taking bath in the channel, he, along with the occupants of the car, sustained grievous injuries.

Though they were rushed to the hospital, Raja, a sawmill worker, succumbed to his injuries. Shencottai police have registered a case.
title: Car plunges into channel, kills youth
